title: The Emperor's oblong pancake. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Fine Arts and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: An animated version of the story by Peter Hughes about the emperor who tried to change all the round objects in his kingdom into oblong ones. Narrated by Edward Everett Horton. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
